name: 300 Eggs
description:
Created by: matthew ostil (@matthewostil)

300 Eggs was a one week spring themed game jam.

Explore a small island packed with eggs to find and collect. Using platformer skills, discovering hidden chests and interacting with NPCs, can you find them all?

Controls

Arrow Keys / WASD / Analogue Stick
Run Around

Spacebar / Gamepad (A)
Interact
